data.event: It started in 1889, when J. C. Montgomery purchased land for a townsite north of Salisbury on the Fort Worth and Denver City Railway.

event.title: presented a plat early in January

data.event: Montgomery and Robertson, with Rev. J. W. Brice and T. J. Woods, Jr., of Dallas, formed a townsite company and presented a plat early in January 1890.
The name was submitted and accepted, and a post office was established on September 12, 1890, with Robertson as postmaster.
